title: Seeking Refuge
description:
Can ordinary people survive the apocalypse? Raine Caldwell is about to find out.The government isn’t coming to rescue her. If Raine and her group are going to make it, they must save themselves. The realization that the lights were not coming back on anytime soon hit them hard. When things go from bad to worse, they must act quickly in search of a refuge from the cold and violent city. Seeking Refuge is book two in T. L. Payne’s Gateway to Chaos series.
Get it now!
